name: Getta Grip
description:
A 2d platform shoot-em-up where the player can mix and match their own gun. 

(Game is still in an early build-feedback appreciated)

Controlls:

A-D: Move Left/Right.

Space: Jump

Face Wall And Jump: Wall Jump

S: Crouch

Shift: Dash

Left Click: Shoot

Right Click: Reload

Many things are still incomplete!
